sentence: There are seven people running for the PA senate seat including two women, one white, one black: Kathy Barnette (Republican): MAGA businesswoman from Montgomery County, occasional Fox News commentator; Jeff Bartos (Republican): A real estate investor from Montgomery County; Sean Gale (Republican): A lawyer from Montgomery County; David McCormick (Republican) A former CEO of one of the world's largest hedge funds; Mehmet Oz (Republican): A TV celebrity doctor; Carla Sands (Republican): from Mechanicsburg, Trumps' former ambassador to Denmark; George Bochetto (Republican): A Philadelphia defense attorney who sued the city over boxing-up of a statue of Christopher Columbus.
author: Bonchie
title: Donald Trump Just Made an Absolutely Head-Scratching Endorsement

sentence: Trump: I’ve gotta be the cleanest— I think I’m the most honest human being perhaps that god ever created pic.twitter.com/D98itzA6vi — Acyn (@Acyn) April 10, 2022 If there was one bit of actual news to be gleaned from Trump’s North Carolina appearance last night, it was his endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz for the Republican nomination for Senator in Pennsylvania.
author: Vinnie Longobardo
title: FUTILE RAMBLINGS: Trump’s North Carolina rally provides him with ever diminishing returns

sentence: President Trump vows to ‘demand justice for the Jan. 6 prisoners and full protection of their civil rights like was received by ANTIFA, Black Lives Matter who murdered people throughout our country.’ pic.twitter.com/I9VxV5zpjh President Trump: ‘We must ensure that every election can be FULLY and quickly audited.’ pic.twitter.com/9sWhOHumo6 Trump confirmed his endorsement for Dr. Mehmet Oz, in Pennsylvania, who is running for U.S. Senate.
author: DML News App
title: WATCH: Highlights from Trump’s speech at North Carolina rally

sentence: A new WHTM/Emerson College Polling/The Hill Pennsylvania primary poll shows David McCormick and Mehmet Oz continuing to lead in the Republican race for one of Pennsylvania’s U.S. Senate seats.
author: Duke
title: Did Donald Trump Just Burn Some Bridges With His Base Over the Dr. Oz Endorsement?

sentence: That fact was borne out over the weekend when Trump endorsed TV doctor Mehmet Oz over hedge fund rich guy David McCormick in advance of next month's Republican Senate primary.
author: Chris Cillizza
title: The very simple reason why Donald Trump chose Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania

sentence: Trump has endorsed both men as he continues to throw his support behind various Republicans running, including recently Dr. Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania.
author: Zachary Leeman
title: Trump Rally in North Carolina Draws Fewer Than 2,000 People: Report

sentence: Trump has endorsed Herschel Walker in his race to unseat Sen. Raphael Warnock, D-Ga., Rep. Ted Budd in his campaign to replace retiring Sen. Richard Burr, R-N.C., and Dr. Mehmet Oz in his close primary race to replace retiring Sen. Pat Toomey, R-Pa. Trump has not yet endorsed a Senate candidate in Ohio, although multiple Republicans seek his support.
author: Timothy Frudd
title: Trump’s approval rating remains strong among Republicans

sentence: Donald Trump’s recent endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz in the Pennsylvania Republican Senate primary shook MAGA world to its core.
author: Rick Moran
title: The Silly Talk of Trump's Demise Over Oz Endorsement

author: Bryan Anderson
title: Smart tactic or missed opportunity? Budd is the latest GOP frontrunner to avoid debates

sentence: KEY POINTS Trump said he received advice from Dr. Oz to lose weight and observe a healthy lifestyle Trump is known for his love of McDonald's and Diet Coke Trump can down approximately a dozen Diet Cokes each day Former President Donald Trump recently lamented that he does not have the time to lose weight as he told a crowd about the advice he received from TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz, who he recently endorsed for the Pennsylvania Senate Race.
author: Danielle Ong
title: Trump Talks About His Weight: 'I Don’t Have Time To Lose Weight'

sentence: Oz is on the far right, seen here with the Trumps and Piers Morgan on the left +7 View gallery +7 View gallery Conservatives are grumbling over former President Donald Trump's (left) decision to back Dr. Mehmet Oz (right) in the May 17 Republican Senate primary +7 View gallery Human Events' Jack Posobiec, a Pennsylvania native, tweeted out footage of a vintage Dr. Oz episode that focused on transgender children The Trump endorsement could break a deadlock in the Pennsylvania race.

title: REVEALED: Dr. Oz bought up thousands of dollars of Trump-backed hydroxychloroquine pills during pandemic
